programme.desc: ATV joyriders lead officers on an unwieldy chase. An attempt to check on some expired tags ends with a couple at gunpoint. A motorist gives deputies his brother’s name in hopes of avoiding jail time.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E14 She Needed a Nap
programme.desc: Deputies pursue a man involved in a carjacking. Deputies are called to an altercation between a father and son. Officers respond to an unresponsive woman lying in a roadway.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E17 Family Therapy
programme.desc: Officers are flagged down and alerted to a group of armed men assaulting people at a nearby home. A fight between a father and his adult son takes a dark turn. A father threatens his daughter and her boyfriend with a knife.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E13 I’ll Raise My Voice Right Back
programme.desc: The new chief in town oversees a series of undercover drug buys. Officers arrest a drunken man who can’t stop talking. A domestic abuse suspect admits to laying the smack down on her mooching husband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E13 Naked and Tired
programme.desc: Officers are called when two intoxicated suspects decide to have some fun and vandalize a fence. Undercover officers set up a narcotics sting at a hotel. A man is found lying naked in a parking lot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E13 Wardrobe Malfunction
programme.desc: A suspect flees police in a truck over a misdemeanor traffic warrant. A man denies hitting his wife who has a bloody nose. A man denies ownership of his shorts when deputies find drugs in them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E36 Extreme COPS
programme.desc: Several squad cars join together in pursuit of a pickup truck. Officers conduct a drug raid utilizing percussion grenades. A suspect wanted for numerous robberies flees from Police in a sports car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S28 : E07 Thick as Thieves
programme.desc: Officers chase car thieves through town and into the bushes. A friendship crumbles when the cops asks questions. A deputy stops a man who insists that he lets homeless people use his car for storage.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S28 : E15 Fighting to Lose
programme.desc: An after hours search of a park turns up a young couple in a porta potty. An extremely combative man refuses to surrender. A heated argument between best friends catches the attention of the cops.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E18 An Innocent Gardener
programme.desc: Officers pursue a vehicle that struck a police car. Two men deny the lawnmower in their truck is stolen. Deputies are called when a mother attempts to run her daughter over.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E12 The Car is Mine!
programme.desc: A man locks himself in a trunk after deputies respond to a restraining order call. Deputies respond to two women arguing over the ownership of a car. A driver comes clean to a deputy during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E21 Beer Run
programme.desc: A carjacking results in a chase and a flipped vehicle. Suspects crash a truck after attempting to steal beer. A man attempts to swallow his drugs during a bust.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E08 Yard Work
programme.desc: Deputies respond to a call of a man shooting a gun in his front yard. Officers are called to a domestic dispute over a wrinkly infant’s shirt. Four armed and suspicious men are spotted by deputies.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E18 Not Your Papi
programme.desc: A man in New Jersey is arrested for possession. A couple is pulled over while looking to score. A routine traffic stop turns into a fruitful drug bust.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E05 Call the Manager
programme.desc: An angry customer threatens a store employee with a rock. Officers suspect the ‘medicine’ found in a suspect’s car is actually his business product. A stepfather gets into a fist fight.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E08 Cell Phone Secrets
programme.desc: A high-speed chase ends when the suspect plays chicken with a concrete pole. An emotional man just wants the cops to give him a little kiss. A melee breaks out when a woman seizes her beau's cell phone.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E26 Bail Fail
programme.desc: During a routine traffic stop, an Officer recognizes the passengers from a prior drug related arrest. A K-9 unit assists in the pursuit of a grand theft auto suspect who flees on foot. An arrest is made after a couple leaving a known drug house is pulled over and questioned.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E30 Follow the Tire Tracks
programme.desc: A decoy vehicle is strategically abandoned in a public parking lot. An officer responds to a burglary in progress at a tire store. Officers respond to a domestic call at a nearby trailer park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E26 Copy of Leave her Alone
programme.desc: A shots fired investigation results in a foot pursuit and the recovery of a discarded firearm. An officer intervenes in a family dispute involving a daughter, boyfriend and $9,000 in warrants. Three women are questioned in connection to a suspicious vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S29 : E23 Cookies and Contraband
programme.desc: A detective gets injured while chasing after a suspected car thief. A young couple gets caught up in cuffs after a bar fight. Officers find a surprising variety of items in a suspect’s vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E20 Bikinis & Handcuffs
programme.desc: An Officer struggles with a suspect after he appears to reach for a gun. When a car is parked on a desolate road, an officer conducts a routine search and discovers methamphetamine. A woman in a bikini is arrested for driving on a suspended license after an officer pulls her over for a busted tail light.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E09 Feeling the Breeze
programme.desc: A truck driver decides to hide from police in the last place they’ll look: his own house. A man out on a beer run is robbed at knifepoint. In Portland a man decides to go nude for a bike ride.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E16 My Bills Won't Wait
programme.desc: A suspect calls the police and states that he wants to kill himself and any officer who tries to help him. None of the three occupants of a stopped car will admit to ownership of a bag of drugs. A man begs not to be arrested so that he can pay child support.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E16 Never Been Busted
programme.desc: An attempted pull over results in a foot chase and eventual arrest. An officer makes a drug-related arrest during a routine traffic stop. An officer makes a sizeable drug seizure during a field sobriety check.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E33 Tuscon Tussle
programme.desc: Officers respond to an armed robbery and carjacking, the suspects are arrested on several charges. A concerned sister reports a fight between her brother and a heavyset burglar. Officers pursue a stolen vehicle and a high speed chase ensues which ends in a wreck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S28 : E28 Front Door Felony
programme.desc: Cops use cameras to track a suspected motorbike thief. A K-9 unit surveys a hilltop when officers suspect a man of wrongdoing. A concerned citizen steps in to stop a pair of would-be mail thieves.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E32 Over the Wall
programme.desc: A white-knuckled police chase ends in a dramatic escape and an unsettling officer injury. A woman spots an intoxicated prowler in a tree. Officers bring in the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspicious van.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E29 The Last Home Invasion
programme.desc: Police investigate an attempted robbery that turned deadly. Officers enlist a K9 unit to flush out a suspect. A high-speed chase comes to an end when the suspect crashes into a fence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E10 If You Hear Hooves
programme.desc: A woman needs police help when her boyfriend threatens her with a knife. A zebra runs loose on the streets of Sacramento County. A man wants to use a stick and a rock to settle a dispute.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E09 Gimme a Break
programme.desc: Officers pursue two brothers after an attempted bank robbery. A confused man with a shotgun calls police after hearing voices. A man asks deputies for a break after they find illegal items in his truck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E09 Pretty White Lies
programme.desc: An officer arrests a driver who attempts to swallow drugs stashed in his mouth. An officer arrests a repeated drug offender in an area notorious for drug trafficking. An officer pulls over an unlicensed woman driver who is arrested for providing falsified identification.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E02 Who Let the Dogs Out
programme.desc: Officers deploy a police K-9 when a burglary suspect takes refuge in a lemon tree. A suspect on the run seeks shelter in a stranger’s house. A biker with a suspended license just doesn’t know how to listen.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E25 Hide and Go Porch
programme.desc: Officers engage in a car chase when they spot a possible robbery suspect. A man nicknamed “Danger” is tasered after assaulting several girls. Suspects bail from a vehicle and hide under a porch.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E01 Liar, Liar
programme.desc: Officer ends up in a foot pursuit after pulling over a suspicious vehicle with expired tags. A recovering addict is caught with drug paraphernalia in her backpack. A man is served an arrest warrant for sexual battery.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E36 Pumping Iron
programme.desc: Teens are arrested after authorities find an open container and drugs inside a vehicle. A suspect is arrested after fleeing the police. Officers respond to a fight involving two men and a shovel.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E08 Mud Slingers
programme.desc: Police use convenience store footage to make an arrest for burglary. Police attempt to help two neighbors reconcile their differences. Officers arrest a woman for domestic violence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E04 Settled with a Pipe
programme.desc: A man attacking a woman is tackled by an officer. A vehicle is pulled over for a drug deal in progress. A woman smashes a car window with a pipe in a fit of road rage.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E05 Put Your Clothes Back On
programme.desc: Cops try desperately to get an unclothed man to cooperate. After a chase with a pickup truck, officers find a 14-year-old in the driver’s seat. On a routine traffic stop, police contend with a plethora of dope and even more lies.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E05 You're Not Banksy
programme.desc: Officers get a tip and locate the suspect in a recent shooting. A woman is questioned when she is found parked alone in her car behind closed businesses. Officers respond to a call involving juveniles spray painting an electrical box.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E14 Bumming a Smoke
programme.desc: A suspect tries to elude officers by driving on a rough road. An argument over a cigarette turns ugly. Kids throw rocks from an overpass at the wrong car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E26 Not a Momma's Boy
programme.desc: Officers are called to fight between a mother and her son. Officers respond to a man on a trolley hurling racial slurs at a passenger. A traffic stop uncovers narcotics in a young man’s trunk.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E21 Pursuit Assistance
programme.desc: Officers enlist the help of a K-9 unit after suspects in a dangerous high-speed chase abandon their car in a residential area. A woman with visible injuries tells the Officer that her husband assaulted her after they left a drive-in. A woman sprays her boyfriend with mace when she sees him with another woman.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S28 : E01 Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: An armed trespasser uses a young dog as a shield. A woman under the influence goes on a rampage, tearing into homes and people. A cat lady calls the cops when her neighbors get nosy.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E25 Scary Monsters
programme.desc: A resistant suspect thinks he sees monsters everywhere. Cops are forced to officiate a spousal wrestling match. Officers try to sort out where two motorists got their car and whose dope they possess.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S29 : E01 From Sixty to Zero
programme.desc: A motorcyclist gambles with his life during a high-speed chase. One lawbreaker will say anything to avoid being caught. A recent parolee blames Mom when the cops question him about his past.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E21 Hands Off The Junk
programme.desc: A passenger bails from a fleeing stolen vehicle then claims that he was only getting a ride. An undercover officer pulls a sting on a handsy prostitute. An anxious lady gets nabbed for weed after calling the police on her quarrelsome husband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E15 Rocks Are Cool
programme.desc: A suspect has a change of heart after he leads police on a pursuit. An Officer discovers sterile syringes and rocks in a suspicious man’s pocket after he is stopped and searched. A woman is arrested for stealing C.D's out of a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S29 : E17 Two Doors Down
programme.desc: A deputy calls for backup when he is outnumbered. A man gets more than he bargained for when he tries to assist his neighbor. A husband and wife are separated after deputies search their vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E15 Mamma's House
programme.desc: Deputies search for a man who ran from a traffic stop. A man being pursued tells officers he was going to his mother’s house. A drunk driver won’t admit to hitting a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E03 Dead Man Flushing
programme.desc: Officers try to make sense of a store transaction turned wrestling match. An intoxicated woman calls the cops when her boyfriend tries to flush her late husband's ashes. A shirtless man with a nasty attitude defies officers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S28 : E18 Too Many Cooks
programme.desc: A lawbreaker’s polite and respectful demeanor surprises deputies. Suspicious activity at a gas station leads one officer to trust her gut. An argument over dinner results in a call to the cops.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E25 Fangs Come Out
programme.desc: A woman bites the arresting officer and store manager after trying to steal beer. A passenger of a suspicious vehicle attempts to hide drugs. Police respond to a call involving a knife and two women.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E04 Five Shots and Four Sons
programme.desc: Officers get more than they expected when they stop a cyclist and discover a deadly weapon. Four sons attempt to break into the family home after being banned. A homeowner claims he accidently fired five shots while cleaning a gun.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E09 Poor Conflict Resolution
programme.desc: A suspect in a traffic stop decides to handle the situation by screaming at the police. Officers have a close encounter with a suspect who admits that he has hidden contraband. A man’s clothing choices tip police off to possible criminal behavior.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E11 This Man Stabbed Me
programme.desc: A car thief leads police on a high-speed chase until officers pit his vehicle to end the pursuit. Cops cool off a baby and search for the man who left him in a car. Potty-mouthed witnesses inform officers that their friend has been stabbed in the chest.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E14 Jawbreaker
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, officers stop to talk to a young woman who appears to be soliciting prostitution. A father accuses his son of breaking his jaw. While running from officers, a suspect attempts to drop evidence on the street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E28 Hot Equipment
programme.desc: A suspicious man attempts to flee Police on foot and is later arrested for possession. Officers in New Jersey charge a garage owner with receiving stolen property. Officers arrest a man after witnesses report purse snatching.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E29 Crash Landing
programme.desc: Hiding in an attic doesn’t work out so well for a man who comes crashing through a ceiling. Cops stop a man with a broken car and a broken heart. Neighbors call the police when non-stop cussin’ interrupts their night.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E20 Hot Pursuit
programme.desc: A dangerous pursuit between Officers and a known meth dealer ends in an arrest. A suspect with several felony warrants is apprehended without incident. A pursuit involving a stolen motorcycle exceeds speed of 100mph.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E29 Apologies Detective
programme.desc: Officers hold a man under a car at gunpoint after a traffic stop. Officers are flagged down and directed to a couple arguing on the street. A man apologizes to detectives for the illicit items they find.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E24 I’m With You Guys
programme.desc: A man involved in a drug deal claims he works for the task force. An irate woman slams the front door when Officers arrive. Police pull over two young suspects in an area known for drug activity.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E18 Tit for Tat
programme.desc: A suspect bails out of his vehicle when a car chase reaches a dead-end. An officer responds to a domestic disturbance call and recommends that the quarreling couple get a divorce. Officers investigate a suspected drug transaction.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E25 Dark Trailer Park
programme.desc: Police investigate a possible abduction at a trailer park. A man in a stolen truck is pulled over and Officers discover washed checks and drug paraphernalia. A suspect is arrested after abandoning a stolen vehicle behind a fast food restaurant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S29 : E25 Bikini Brawl
programme.desc: A suspect claims he would have gotten away with his crime if it hadn't been for his girlfriend. Officers are called when a mother’s job hunt unravels. Deputies confront a nervous man with bad habits.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E07 No Money, More Problems
programme.desc: A woman hides in her apartment after she skips out on paying her cab fare. A knife fight results in multiple calls to the police for help. A French tourist get a bus ride from Hell in Florida.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E01 Coco the Clown
programme.desc: An officer shows up as Coco the Clown in an undercover sting. The Vice unit conducts a reverse-prostitution sting designed to capture suspected “johns.”

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E15 Jumping to Conclusions
programme.desc: Officers encounter an unusual situation where the victim and suspect have defiantly barricaded themselves inside the house. Officers respond to a domestic dispute at a nearby apartment complex.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E10 Hot Potato
programme.desc: A man tosses his stash after being pulled over. Officers question two men in a fight who live with the same woman. A man says his shorts are from a thrift store after drugs are found in them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E09 Crazy as a Loon
programme.desc: Officers conduct a traffic stop on a vehicle that ran a stop sign. Officers retrieve birds from a fireplace and release them outside. Officers conduct a drug-reversal-buy sting to capture buyers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E05 Wardrobe Clash
programme.desc: A homeless man hides from deputies in the closet of an empty house. Officers called to a shooting find a man covered in blood. Deputies arrive to a domestic disturbance to find two brothers fighting over a pair of sandals.

programme.title: Tom the Tow Truck

programme.title: Tom's Garage

programme.title: Here We Dance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Cheerful dances to best kid’s songs will make you healthy. Work-out and stay healthy!

programme.title: Super Solver SAMMY 2
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Episode1
programme.desc: There is always Sammy next to Pinkfong and friends, where incidents and accidents never cease. But... the solving process is a mess!? Well, anyway, the clumsy problem solver Sammy gets things done!

programme.title: Love Is All Around the World
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Love Is All Around the World
programme.desc: Let's go on a journey aboard the heart boat and the heart hot air balloon! Travel around the world with Baby Shark and say "I love you" in various languages.

programme.title: Bebefinn Welcome to the Dino World
programme.desc: Huh? Where are we? Wow! It's the Dino World! Bebefinn is here in the amazing land of dinosaurs!

programme.title: Baby Shark Fire and Rescue Play
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Baby Shark Fire Rescue Team, Go! Brave Baby Shark rushes to help friends in danger—anytime, anywhere! Join exciting rescue missions and become a hero firefighter!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Birthday Party
programme.desc: Shh! Let’s secretly plan a big, bouncy birthday party! Who’s it for? It’s for Baby Shark—the one who fills our hearts with love!

programme.title: Baby Animal Got Lost Ep1
programme.desc: Join Police Pinkfong and Ninimo as they help lost baby animals find their moms and dads!

programme.title: Bebefinn
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 Episode 7
programme.desc: Baby Finn Learns Something New Everyday with the Funn Family! Here comes another beautiful precious day of Finn, a Baby Shark lover just as our children, and his Family. Enjoy the daily life of the Bebefinn Family filled with joyful songs.

programme.title: Bebefinn
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Episode 8
programme.desc: Baby Finn Learns Something New Everyday with the Funn Family! Here comes another beautiful precious day of Finn, a Baby Shark lover just as our children, and his Family. Enjoy the daily life of the Bebefinn Family filled with joyful songs.

programme.title: Bebefinn Number Songs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bebefinn Number Songs
programme.desc: One, two, three.Four, five, six.Seven, eight, nine, ten. Numbers, numbers.La la la la la la la. Have fun counting numbers!

programme.title: Here We Dance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Episode 4
programme.desc: Cheerful dances to best kid’s songs will make you healthy. Work-out and stay healthy!

programme.title: Pinkfong's Snack Time
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Friends sent a secret recipe to Little Chef Pinkfong! You can make any snack delicious Shall we learn how to make snacks with exciting songs and rhythms?

programme.title: Bebefinn I Spy Song
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bebefinn I Spy Song
programme.desc: Let’s find red things! Bebefinn, Bora, and Brody are playing a color-finding game. Learn this easy color search game you can play at home!

programme.title: Pinkfong Sing-Along Movie 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Wonderstar Concert
programme.desc: Pinkfong and Hogi decide to hold a wonderful concert with Wonderville friends, showcasing each of their favorite songs! However, while preparing for the tour, Team Wonderstar begins arguing as they are getting tired from practicing due to differences in opinions while preparing the stage… Will Pinkfong and Hogi be able to overcome various conflicts and difficulties to deliver the perfect show?

programme.title: Poki's Toy Lab
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: A genius inventor Poki makes toys to play with Pinkfong and Baby Shark.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs for Children
programme.sub-title: S01 : E46 Color Song Halloween
programme.desc: Play and learn colors with Baby Shark and Halloween Surprise Box!

programme.title: Baby Shark Color Songs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Baby Shark Color Songs
programme.desc: We are the Shark Family! Full of colors, Shark Family! Dance along and match what color each family member!

programme.title: Happy New Year, Bebefinn
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Happy New Year, Bebefinn
programme.desc: The Bebefinn family looks back on the year while flipping through their photo album. What fun things happened to the Bebefinn family this year? It was a happy year because everyone was together. Let’s fill the new year with even more sweet and happy moments with the Bebefinn family!

programme.title: Pinkfong & Hogi: New Friend Ninimo
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Episode 4
programme.desc: One day, Pinkfong’s magical powers and memories of home planet Staria slowly start to disappear, and a mysterious cat named Ninimo appears! But even without the magical powers and memories, Pinkfong discovers the magic of friendship in Wonderville.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs for Children
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Pinkfong World Songs
programme.desc: Meet Coco, Toto and Momo! Travel around the world with the CoToMo Cats.

programme.title: Dance Adventure
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Episode 3
programme.desc: Arrr-! Are you ready for a fun adventure? Come and let's sing and dance together! Arrr-!

programme.title: We Are Firefighters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Today, we’re firefighters! Join Firefighter Pinkfong and learn what firefighters do. Emergency call! Let’s go!

programme.title: Baby Shark Boulevard
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Baby Shark, the beloved global star, is on the move! To meet fans from all around the world, Baby Shark is setting out on an exciting journey. Join the adventure and meet Baby Shark!

programme.title: Baby Shark Boulevard
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Episode 2
programme.desc: Baby Shark, the beloved global star, is on the move! To meet fans from all around the world, Baby Shark is setting out on an exciting journey. Join the adventure and meet Baby Shark!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: It’s birthday time! All birthday friends, gather around! Bebefinn, Bora, and Brody are here to celebrate each and every one of you!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Episode 3

programme.desc: Welcome to Baby Shark Hospital, where Dr. Baby Shark will take care of you!

programme.title: Pinkfong Super Rescue Team
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Episode 2
programme.desc: Hoi Poi Pinkfong! Pinkfong joins the Super Rescue Team! Join Pinkfong and the Super Rescue Team to solve all the cases happening in the city and learn essential safety tips along the way.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1

programme.title: Save Our Home, Our Earth
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Save Our Home, Our Earth
programme.desc: We protect the Earth! Join Earth Guardians Pinkfong and Baby Shark to learn how to take care of our planet! Hold on tight—whoosh!

programme.title: Bebefinn Boo Boo Song
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bebefinn Boo Boo Song
programme.desc: Ouch, ouch, it hurts! Help me! I was running and playing outside today! Ouch! I got hurt while running fast and sliding down the slide. Mommy, Daddy! Please make it better so it doesn’t hurt anymore!

programme.title: Happy Birthday to 100 Friends
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Episode 3
programme.desc: It’s birthday time! All birthday friends, gather around! Bebefinn, Bora, and Brody are here to celebrate each and every one of you!

programme.title: Pinkfong Halloween Dance Party

programme.desc: It’s Halloween time again! Join the fun and dance along with adorable little monsters!

programme.title: Zombie Shark Family Hide and Seek
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Zombie Shark Family Hide and Seek
programme.desc: Oh no! All the Shark Family turn into Zombie except the Baby Shark Brooklyn! Baby Shark has to turn his family back to normal. Friends, Will you help?

programme.title: Baby Shark Halloween Fun
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Baby Shark Halloween Fun 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Emergency! Emergency! Strange things are happening in town as darkness falls on Halloween night! But with the Police Shark Family on duty, even the spookiest Halloween is no problem at all!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Episode 2
programme.desc: Today, we’re firefighters! Join Firefighter Pinkfong and learn what firefighters do. Emergency call! Let’s go!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Mommy, thank you for being there, loving me, putting up with me, listening, your patience, and everything!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Tucker & Roland's School Disco 50!
programme.desc: Todd Carty & Erkan Mustafa - otherwise known as Grange Hill's Tucker & Roland - host the ultimate school disco! But as they prop up the bar, will anyone else turn up?

programme.title: The Ultimate 80s Mix!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Ultimate 80s Mix!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made the 80s!

programme.title: Who Did This First?! Top 40
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Who Did This First?! Top 40
programme.desc: Would you believe that these 40 massive melodies were originally sung by someone else! Find who did it first as we play hits by Soft Cell, Tina Turner, Phil Collins & Donna Summer.

programme.title: The Ultimate 80s Mix!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Ultimate 80s Mix!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made the 80s!

programme.title: Make Mine A Double with Pat Sharp!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Make Mine A Double with Pat Sharp!
programme.desc: They says 2 heads are better than one & in the 80s the charts were full of collaborations. So pour a large one & have double the fun with Pat Sharp's top 40 duets.

programme.title: 1984 Unleashed!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 1984 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1984!

programme.title: Madonna! 1984-1990
programme.desc: Madonna's biggest hits - from the beginning. Some of the most iconic videos of the decade from Holiday right through to 1990's Vogue, via Like a Virgin & Like a Prayer.

programme.title: All Day - They Hit The Top Spot!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 All Day - They Hit The Top Spot!
programme.desc: All day - a choice selection of the 168 singles that reached the top of the UK charts in the 1970s!

programme.title: NOW 70s presents NOW 60s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 NOW 70s presents NOW 60s!
programme.desc: 5 hours of flashbacks from the swinging 60s! Including Johnny Cash, Sam Cooke, The Kinks, Lulu, The Beach Boys, The Beatles, The Troggs, Bob Dylan, The Rolling Stones & Elvis.

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1976
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The NOW Yearbook 1976
programme.desc: The hottest songs from the year of a record breaking summer! Simon Bates has the soundtrack of a great 12 months in pop, including Wings, Wild Cherry & The Wurzels!

programme.title: 50 Years Ago - It's 1976 Day!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 50 Years Ago - It's 1976 Day!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1976 & relive that long hot summer of hits. Including Abba, Showaddywaddy, Elton John, Kiki Dee and the early days of punk!

programme.title: The 1976 POWER Hour with Bam!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The 1976 POWER Hour with Bam!
programme.desc: 60 minutes of power pop & rock! Earplugs at the ready as we rewind to 1976 with Genesis, Thin Lizzy, Peter Frampton & The Sex Pistols!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1976
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1976
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of heatwave hits & headlines from a year of contrasts - Punk, Dancing Queen, the Inter-City 125, the Honey Monster & that year's top toy - Swingball!

programme.title: 50 Years Ago - It's 1976 Day!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 50 Years Ago - It's 1976 Day!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1976 & relive that long hot summer of hits. Including Abba, Showaddywaddy, Elton John, Kiki Dee and the early days of punk!

programme.title: Every Number 2 of 1976

programme.title: Who Won Wot in 1976?

programme.title: 70s Glam Slam!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bowie v Bolan! 1970-1974

programme.title: The Hit Songs of Grease!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Scallops & Pork
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the more tantalizing dish! The catch? Each of their plates must prominently feature both scallops and pork tenderloin!

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Lebanese Take-Out
programme.desc: In just 30 minutes, Chef Spencer Watts whips up a fast and flavourful Lebanese Take-Out for four people.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Indian Take-Out
programme.desc: Spencer Watts cooks an Indian takeout dinner for four in around 30 minutes, for around 30 dollars.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Hawaiian Pizza
programme.desc: Host Micah Trainor's Hawaiian Pizza is the perfect salty- sweet piece of pie, with grilled pineapple and supERS-easy homemade pizza dough. That's dinner done, so Missy Hui handles dessert, with a Pineapple Upside-Down Cake covered in a homemade sea salt caramel. Next, colour is the core of Tiera Singh's vegan Rainbow Salad Rolls - juicy mango, creamy avocado, and crisp bibb lettuce are wrapped in rice paper for a vibrant veggie-filled dish. Then it's Poppy Sandler's turn to really Up the Dish... her response? Salty Miso and sweet Honey meet for her Black Cod with Sesame-Garlic Veggies! The marinated fish is seared and served over savoury veggies roasted in garlic- infused sesame oil.

For a final recipe, a dessert fit for a lumberjack or a Greek god! Oka Saganaki with McIntosh Apple Butter and Maple Loukoumades; made with nutty Canadian Oka cheese,...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Mexico + Norway
programme.desc: In this episode of CombiNATION Plates, host Bianca Osbourne starts in Mexico with her version of popular street snack, 'Esquites', re-invented here as sweet corn flan. Next is Norway, don't miss explosively exciting quick-smoked Arctic Char with Forage, you've NEVER seen anything like this before. The common ingredient is tacos! From Norway, 'Lefse' is a potato-flour 'tortilla' served with fresh berries and uniquely Scandinavian 'Brunost' cheese. Representing Mexico, check out spicy pork and pineapple 'Tacos al Pastor'. The Big Dish is Lamb Pinnekjott with Birch Bark Tamale, lamb ribs are seasoned, birch bark is stuffed with masa and veggies, both are steamed over birch branches and boozy...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Avocados and Apricots
programme.desc: "A" is on the menu and Chef Robert Jewell takes on this meal challenge with apricots and avocados. First up, Robert cooks a spicy roasted quail and drizzles it with some sweet apricot and calvados sauce. Next, is a meal best served cold! Robert slices up sushi-grade tuna and transforms it into a flavourful tartare, brought to life by rich avocado and refreshing lime. On the side, he adds crusty crostini with savoury soy sauce and sesame oil, the perfect complement for this meltin- your-mouth meal. For his final dish, Robert combines apricots and avocados for an unbelievably tasty dish.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Dill and Duck
programme.desc: Host Theresa Visintin picks the letter “D” in this challenge and combines two very different ingredients – dill and duck! But that’s no big dill for Theresa. For her first dish, Theresa uses dill seeds and weed to make a hearty, creamy dill pickle soup. She adds chicken broth and potatoes as her base but makes the soup extra smooth with some sour cream. She tops the soup with dill pickles to add a delightful crunch. Next, Theresa takes duck, a classic French ingredient, and gives it a French Canadian twist – duck tourtière. Using the duck fat to fry up some veggies, she adds red wine to her chicken stock and simmers the meat. Then, Theresa fills a pie crust with this delightful duck...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Endive and Eggplant
programme.desc: Showcasing the unique flavours of endive and eggplant, Chef Lauren Gulyas receives the letter "E" for her cooking challenge. She sets sail by creating an endive salad boat, the perfect delivery vessel for her smoked trout with creÌ€me fraiche, and goat cheese with walnut appetizers. She follows up with a stuffed baby eggplant, Moroccan style! Chef Lauren sauteÌs onion and garlic with some smoky sweet paprika and a snip of savoury sage, the aromatic combination lends itself beautifully to the succulent flavour of lamb. For her grand finale, Chef Lauren prepares the pieÌ€ce de reÌsistance using both endive and eggplant.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Italy + China
programme.desc: Join engaging host, Bianca Osbourne, for a taste of two countries. First stop? Italy! Check out her recipe for succulent wild boar ribs, braised until tender, rolled in gremolata, and served over silky polenta. Next up? A culinary tribute to China, pairing lobster claw with chili oil, pomelo foam, and oyster sauce glazed bok choy. Every episode features a 'common ingredient', this time? It's noodles! Drool over two recipes: Italian classic Olio e Aglio next to chewy Chinese long Noodles tossed with Sichuan Chili Oil. For the big finale, Bianca blends Italian style with Chinese flavour for a one-of-a-kind CombiNation Plate: Kung Pao Pork Osso Bucco over Forbidden Black Rice Risotto... made...

Next, an Indonesian tribute: Crab Leg with Coconut Curry. For the 'common ingredient'? Two takes on tender, savoury eggplant! Turkish Eggplant is braised and served with parsley and feta and the Indonesian take is served with fried garlic and sweet soy. For the CombiNATION Plate? programme.desc: Chef Dev whips up some of his favorite rice dishes from his travels around the world. including Japanese Onigiri Rice Balls. Fresh and Fried Spring Rolls in rice paper wrappers from Vietnam. and Beef Waterfall Salad with toasted rice powder from Thailand.

programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Onion Odyssey
programme.desc: Chef Dev prepares some of his favorite street food dishes from around the world that feature onions. including Seeni Sambol Buns from Sri Lanka. a Blooming Onion from the USA. and Scallion Pancakes from South Korea.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Shrimp and Sausage
programme.desc: It's all about the letter "S" as Chef Robert Jewell cooks up tasty meals using shrimp and sausage. For his first recipe, Robert fries up turmeric-spiced sweet potato fritters with a shrimp centre. He takes this tantalizing appetizer to another level with a savoury lime soy dipping sauce. Next up, Robert makes an English breakfast strata. This sausage casserole is easily the BEST way to start your day. He layers the bottom of the dish with buttered sourdough slices, before adding crispy fried sausages, leeks and tomatoes. He then covers it in a creamy egg mixture, crumbles stilton on top and bakes it to golden brown. Finally, Robert combines shrimp and sausage into one flavourful dish.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Basilicata
programme.desc: Charming host Chef Michael Bonacini explores the mountainous region of Basilicata with a feast fit for any celebration. Beginning with an antipasto that caters to the region's southern heat, Michael stuffs crunchy sweet peppers with ripe tomatoes, savoury anchovies, and fresh oregano. Moving on to the primo, Michael cooks up a creamy Vermicelli Frittata. Using leftover pasta, he combines eggs with cheese, anchovies, and chili flakes for extra flavour to make a classic Basilicata dish. Michael cooks up Pollo Alla Potentina, a traditional meal from the Feast of Saint Gerard. This hearty chicken stew is sure to heat up your core, using hot peppers as the base of the meal. For his final dish,...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Moon Festival Menu
programme.desc: China celebrates harvest with the Moon Festival, when the moon is at its fullest during mid-autumn. The best part? A delicious feast! Cantonese expert Mary Tang prepares a common Moon Festival dish - earthy and tasty Mushroom Stir Fry. Then, she cooks up a mouth-watering, Cantonese must-have - Steamed Crab. Using flawless technique, Mary breaks the juicy crab into pieces, fries and steams it in scented spices and sauces. Another Moon Festival staple is Cantonese Roast Duck - Mary uses sweet-savoury Chinese five-spice powder, dark soy sauce, and aromatic white pepper to make a fragrant rub. Finally, Moon Cake at the Moon Festival a given. Exquisitely crafted with red bean paste and sweet...

programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Garbanzo Beans and Grapefruit
programme.desc: In this fast-paced episode, host Theresa Visintin uses two unlikely ingredients that start with the letter "G," garbanzo beans and grapefruit! First up, Theresa cooks socca, a savoury garbanzo bean pancake recipe, and infuses it with Mediterranean flavours. To make her batter, Theresa combines chickpea flour with salty olives, sweet red pepper, and fresh basil. Once the batter is ready to go, she fries the savoury crepe. Next up, Theresa balances tart grapefruit with a sweet buttery lobster tail. But that's not sweet enough for Theresa! She prepares sabayon, a delicate honey custard that melts in your mouth. Finally, Theresa shows us how to make a mouth-watering dish by combining...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Chicken and Corn
programme.desc: Chicken and corn are the key players in this letter “C” challenge. Chef Lauren Gulyas prepares one of her favourite Italian dishes, chicken Marsala. Using garlic, shallots, and white wine, Chef Lauren whips up a rich Marsala sauce that is nutty and floral in flavour. Next, she transforms corn into a creamy polenta topping for her Shepard’s pie...with a twist! Sautéing onion, garlic, and lean ground beef, she uses Worcestershire sauce and tomato paste to give the pie filling an extra flavour boost. Once she finishes those dishes, Chef Lauren creates a mouth-watering recipe that combines both chicken and corn.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Kaffir Lime and Kohlrabi
programme.desc: Chef Robert Jewell has a challenge on his hands after picking the letter “K.” He decides to use ingredients kaffir lime and kohlrabi. First, Robert re-invents the ordinary shrimp skewer, using lemongrass as the skewer (yes, the skewer!). He brings the flavour to the next level with zesty kaffir lime. Using the leaves of the kaffir lime with fresh herbs, Robert makes a dipping sauce for the skewer. Next, Robert fries up salty peameal bacon in one pan and sautés earthy kohlrabi with leeks, potato, and garlic in another. He brings the ingredients together into a single skillet, adding eggs and baking it into a hearty frittata. For his final dish, Robert uses both kaffir lime and kohlrabi in...

programme.desc: Fish. Flaky, flavoursome, and perfect for barbeque. High energy host Spencer Watts tests out his grill with delightfully tender fish dishes.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Moon Festival Menu
programme.desc: China celebrates harvest with the Moon Festival, when the moon is at its fullest during mid-autumn. The best part? A delicious feast! Cantonese expert Mary Tang prepares a common Moon Festival dish - earthy and tasty Mushroom Stir Fry. Then, she cooks up a mouth-watering, Cantonese must-have - Steamed Crab. Using flawless technique, Mary breaks the juicy crab into pieces, fries and steams it in scented spices and sauces. Another Moon Festival staple is Cantonese Roast Duck - Mary uses sweet-savoury Chinese five-spice powder, dark soy sauce, and aromatic white pepper to make a fragrant rub. Finally, Moon Cake at the Moon Festival a given. Exquisitely crafted with red bean paste and sweet...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Georgia + Hong Kong
programme.desc: Join Bianca Osbourne to taste and combine! Fun CombiNATION Plates host Bianca Osbourne starts this episode with an inspired tribute to Georgian cuisine; Beef Tartare with Tkemali (sour plum sauce), marigold powder, and tart, crunchy pickles. Next; feast your eyes on her unique Hong Kong dumpling: plump scallops, pork, and veggies are blended, rolled, steamed, sliced, and then served with Crispy Yu Choy and XO. The common ingredient is rabbit! Georgia offers up Rabbit 'Mtsvadi', grilled and glazed with pomegranate reduction. Hong Kong represents with Sweet and Sour Rabbit, Grilled Pineapple and Red Pepper Coulis. Finally, Georgian Milk Braised meets Chinese/Hong Kong-style Roast Duck with...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 South Korea + Spain
programme.desc: CombiNATION Plates host Bianca Osbourne is always looking for the best food in the world to share. The first stop is South Korea with her Sesame Crusted Tuna 'Yukhoe', a delicious blend of favourite Korean flavours. Next stamp on the passport? Spain! Mouth-watering Duck Breast is seared and served rare with a crispy artichoke heart, membrillo, olives, and sweet-savoury sherry reduction. Beef short ribs are the common ingredient with Catalonian Braised and Romesco to one side and sticky Korean Kalbi-style grilled to the east! For the topper, drool over Bulgogi Octopus simmered and served with saffron-scented Sticky Rice Paella cakes, finished with crispy Paprika-Gochujang battered mussel....

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Ethiopia + Brazil
programme.desc: Travel the world without ever leaving the kitchen! Intrepid host of CombiNATION Plates, Bianca Osbourne, starts this episode with Ethiopian inspired Berbere Spiced Quail, seared in aromatic Niter Kibbeh, and served with crunchy-sour Gomen Salad. Brazil is next, check out this re- invention of Feijoada... with braised and seared pork belly, oranges, crema, and fresh black bean salsa. Common ingredient 'Coffee and Sweets' is next... with java-spiked Injera Crepe Cake for Ethiopia and Brazil blending up a dark roast of rich, coffee-spiked, chocolatey Brigadeiros truffles. The final plate is Coconut Crusted Black Cod with cheesy Brazilian-style Pao de Queijo bites, and teff flour a brush of...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Morocco + Thailand
programme.desc: Join CombiNATION Plates host Bianca Osbourne for a trip to Morocco and Thailand! First up, whole Red Snapper is rubbed with earthy Ras el Hanout spice, poached in argan oil, and served with char-grilled oranges. Thailand inspires the next plate; Chicken Thigh 'Lollipop', roasted and served with bamboo shoots, chilies, and sauced with peanut-coconut red curry. Next, these countries both love Spring Rolls... Morocco's version, Briouat, is stuffed with saffron couscous and fresh cheese and fried... from Thailand comes a salad roll with shrimp and mango, dipped in a fiery green Nam Jim. Stick around for the big dish - Saffron buttERS-basted beef Striploin, served with complex Apricot-Green...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Mango and Mustard
programme.desc: “A” is on the menu and Chef Robert Jewell takes on this meal challenge with apricots and avocados. First up, Robert cooks a spicy roasted quail and drizzles it with some sweet apricot and calvados sauce. Next, is a meal best served cold! Robert slices up sushi-grade tuna and transforms it into a flavourful tartare, brought to life by rich avocado and refreshing lime. On the side, he adds crusty crostini with savoury soy sauce and sesame oil, the perfect complement for this meltin- your-mouth meal. For his final dish, Robert combines apricots and avocados for an unbelievably tasty dish.

programme.title: Holiday Eatz
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Valentine's Day
programme.desc: Love is in the air for this Valentine's Day edition of Gusto's Holiday Eatz"... your party menu resource starring supERS-fun kitchen dynamo, Chef Kimberly Lallouz! First base? How about tempura oysters with a kiss of strawberry? Up next, it's straight from the 'heart' with an artichoke tart featuring melty cheese, homemade crust, and fresh herbs. Lamb Chops with Beurre Rouge are the main event, served rare and dusted with freshly ground pink peppercorns. Kimberly wraps things up with a fun new take on Chocolate and Roses - pressing white chocolate ice cream between rosewater spiked sugar cookies. It's a heart-stopping finale worthy of your favourite rom-com!

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Shrimp and Sausage
programme.desc: It's all about the letter "S" as Chef Robert Jewell cooks up tasty meals using shrimp and sausage. For his first recipe, Robert fries up turmeric-spiced sweet potato fritters with a shrimp centre. He takes this tantalizing appetizer to another level with a savoury lime soy dipping sauce. Next up, Robert makes an English breakfast strata. This sausage casserole is easily the BEST way to start your day. He layers the bottom of the dish with buttered sourdough slices, before adding crispy fried sausages, leeks and tomatoes. He then covers it in a creamy egg mixture, crumbles stilton on top and bakes it to golden brown. Finally, Robert combines shrimp and sausage into one flavourful dish.

A culinary tribute to China, pairing lobster claw with chili oil, pomelo foam, and oyster sauce glazed bok choy. Every episode features a 'common ingredient', this time? It's noodles! programme.desc: Turkey, think Silk Road spices. Indonesia, lots of seafood and tropical fruits! Curious and adventurous host Bianca Osbourne is your CombiNATION Plates culinary guide through both food cultures. First, check out Turkish Spice Crusted Lamb Rack with yogurt and blistered peppers. Next, an Indonesian tribute: Crab Leg with Coconut Curry. For the 'common ingredient'? Two takes on tender, savoury eggplant! Turkish Eggplant is braised and served with parsley and feta and the Indonesian take is served with fried garlic and sweet soy. For the CombiNATION Plate? Peanut- chili Sate sauce replaces walnut for Pazili TrancÌ§a, a classically Turkish halibut presentation, also served here with unique,...

From Norway, 'Lefse' is a potato-flour 'tortilla' served with fresh berries and uniquely Scandinavian 'Brunost' cheese. Representing Mexico, check out spicy pork and pineapple 'Tacos al Pastor'. programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 10 Days Scotland Edinburgh (ENG)
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Bulgaria Plovdiv
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Backpack Pozarevac, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bulgaria Sofia
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 10 Days Scotland Aberdeenshire (ENG)
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E29 Backpack Majdanpek, Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Bhutan Paro
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Scotland Inverness (ENG)
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 Backpack Nis, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bhutan Thimpu
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bhutan Phobjikha
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E32 Backpack Sjenica, Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 10 Days Scotland Edinburgh (ENG)
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Bulgaria Plovdiv
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E29 XP Guide, Stockholm
programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.title: Land Rover Experience Tour
programme.desc: Every other year, the Land Rover Experience Tour invites adventurers to explore the world's most remote areas. In 2017, it's time for next tour. The destination: Peru. 30,000 people applied, but only six of them qualified.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Hosts Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite petrol heads from the Middle East to bring their tuned cars to the The Walk at Jumeirah Beach and have it rated in the categories speed, style and sound.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Customized luxury vehicles visit The Walk, the glamorous Jumeirah Beach boulevard; car owners get their vehicles judged by Saif Hattawi.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Tuned and customized vehicles are scored based on speed, style and sound; among the competitors are a Nova SS, a special Honda Acord and a car full of crystals.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Showing viewers the real off-road lifestyle; a look at the first Rally Defender at Europe's biggest all-wheel drive exhibition.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: When winter is coming, you have a lot of advantages with an all-wheel vehicle; there is traction even when the road is slippery; for the driver, this means not only more safety, but also more fun behind the wheel.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Featuring the Subaru WRX STI.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Classic Ride
programme.desc: The Arabella Classics is one of the most exclusive classic car rallies in Europe.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 StreetWise
programme.desc: The new BMW One M Coupe from former race car driver Ralf Kelleners -- the KS1 RS; Toyota presents their TS 030 hybrid at the 24-hour race of Le Mans; Subaru's XV crossover stands out from the company's model range.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 StreetWise
programme.desc: The Mercedes-Benz S250 with a four-cylinder engine needs so little fuel that one could call this car a piggybank; the powerful Nissan 370 Z and Wiesmann GT MF5; the ADAC Eco Test.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 StreetWise
programme.desc: Featuring the Porsche Boxter and the Volkwagon Passat Alltrack.

programme.title: Mercedes Sprinter, 2018
programme.desc: The Mercedes Sprinter belongs to the class of commercial vehicles; the light transporter is the dream for every tradesman; the third generation Sprinter is sleeker, more modern and more variable than ever.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Motorheads
programme.desc: Portrait of Ferruccio Lamborghini, who originally built tractors, but then moved on to found one of the most famous sports car factories in the world.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Motorheads
programme.desc: Ferdinand Anton Ernst Porsche was a pioneer of the car business and created an icon among automobiles, the Porsche 356.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Motorheads
programme.desc: One of the most successful rally drivers of all time, Walter Roehrl.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Motorheads
programme.desc: Hans Joachim Stuck, a racing legend, ended his active career as a race driver in a Lamborghini Gallardo built by Reiter Engineering at the Nurburgring in 2011.

programme.title: Car History
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Car History
programme.desc: Audi is one of the most successful car manufacturers of the present day; the brand with the four rings stands for innovation, superior technology and unique design; founded over 100 years ago, Audi is now a successful global player.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The history of auto unions.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: At a time when horses and carriages characterized traffic, visionaries like Henry Ford were working on the mobility of tomorrow. His ideas and approaches have a major share of the individual mobilization in the world.

programme.title: Car History
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Car History
programme.desc: Few manufacturers have been as active in the USA and Europe as early as Ford - and with success; while the Mustang thrilled American youth, the Capri turned the heads of Europeans.

programme.title: Car History
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Car History
programme.desc: Porsche has competed in the 24-hour Le Mans classic every year since 1951; the company's prototypes have won 18 times - more often than the vehicles of any other manufacturer in the history of this racing series.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Tuning
programme.desc: The largest car exhibition in the world. More than 900 exhibitors present their latest models.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Tuning
programme.desc: Testing what Corvettes, Porsches and Ferraris really have under the hood after SKN Tuning.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Tuning
programme.desc: Racing driver Patrick Simon visits Aston Martin. The manufacturer introduces The Aston Martin V12 Zagato at the Nürburgring.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Tuning
programme.desc: Since 1967, Las Vegas has hosted one of the largest Car and Tuning shows in the world, the SEMA show. In the United States, car freedom is still important and at this show one can find extremes.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Tuning
programme.desc: The tuner from Waiblingen in Swabia, Germany, has over 30 years experience in tuning Mercedes Benz cars.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Tuning
programme.desc: An event for automotive and motor sports enthusiasts where the most extreme vehicles can be seen.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Paul has to slide underneath an exploding vehicle, while Anna is catapulted in the air.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: One stuntman has to go head over heels in his car, while two colleagues combine a car chase with a fistfight.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Stuntmen operate an Artega GT at full speed with a remote control.

programme.title: Bentley S2 Continental Flying Spur
programme.desc: Flowing lines and an elegance that is unmatched; the 1959 Bentley S2 Continental Flying Spur aims to build bridges in the company's model range; from the sporty origin of the brand to the luxury of its new owner, Rolls Royce.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 MotorStories
programme.desc: Frank Slopianka is a racing junkie and constantly takes part in such events; US car fans Kati and Patrick join him for the Race 61, a rock and race festival in Finowfurt near Berlin.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 MotorStories
programme.desc: German entrepreneur Tillmann Moritz loves vintage cars and has a dream of driving through the U.S. in his Mercedes Cabriolet 280 SE 3.5; before he can make his dream come true, he needs to get his car across the French Riviera.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 MotorStories
programme.desc: Tillmann starts his dream journey in New York, the city that never sleeps; with his Mercedes 280 SE convertible he visits the legendary classic car dealer Eliot Cuker who made his fortune with his passion for old cars.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Track Masters
programme.desc: The Nürburgring -- where motor fans let their hair down on a difficult racetrack and learn how to get fit for motor sports.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Track Masters
programme.desc: Entertaining clips from the Nuerburgring. Expect to see the pedal on the metal and rubber burning up the place.

programme.desc: Red Bull athletes break records with space jumps, massive skydives and the world’s biggest BMX loop!

programme.title: For Reals
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 For Reals
programme.desc: Speed skating at 93kph. Skateboarding in the office. BASE jumping from Mount Everest. Diving into crocodile waters. It’s all in a day’s work for Red Bull athletes!

programme.title: For Reals
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 For Reals
programme.desc: Flying a plane at 245kph through a tunnel. A wingsuit flight over an active volcano. A record-breaking truck jump in a ghost town. It’s all in a day’s work for Red Bull athletes!

programme.title: For Reals
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 For Reals
programme.desc: Red Bull athletes tour a town on a snowmobile, freerun through an airport, skateboard out of a flying plane, and ice climb Niagara Falls. It’s all part of their daring day! Don’t miss the adventure!

programme.title: For Reals
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 ACTION: For Reals – Legendary Red Bull Moments
programme.desc: Red Bull athletes fly through Tower Bridge, swing from balloons and slackline epic heights just for thrills.

programme.title: Winter Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 SNOW: Winter Heroes – Athletes at the Top of Their Game
programme.desc: This powerful skier is only the second Croatian woman in history to claim a World Cup Crystal Globe.

programme.title: SKI: Magic Hour – Catching the Perfect Ski Shots
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SKI: Magic Hour – Catching the Perfect Ski Shots
programme.desc: Photographers chase the 'magic hour' to capture skiing when the perfect light makes the mountains come alive.

programme.title: Winter Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 SNOW: Winter Heroes – Athletes at the Top of Their Game
programme.desc: See the trajectory of the Austrian ski jumper who flew from injured up-and-comer to favourite in just a year.

programme.title: SNOWBOARDING: Paved – Burton & Red Bull Media House
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SNOWBOARDING: Paved – Burton & Red Bull Media House
programme.desc: A history lesson, a hangout and a backcountry odyssey co-produced by Burton and Red Bull Media House.

programme.title: Winter Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SNOW: Winter Heroes – Athletes at the Top of Their Game
programme.desc: Witness the dazzling trajectory of a skier who's redefining what it means to be a modern champion.

programme.title: Winter Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 SNOW: Winter Heroes – Athletes at the Top of Their Game
programme.desc: With explosive and unpredictable runs, Alice Robinson is putting New Zealand on the podium in alpine skiing.

programme.title: SKI: Abstract – Faction's High-octane Art
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SKI: Abstract – Faction's High-octane Art
programme.desc: Skiing is art, because nothing screams 'artist' like sending large cliffs and grinding the side of buildings.

programme.title: SNOWBOARDING: Anna Gasser – The Spark Within
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SNOWBOARDING: Anna Gasser – The Spark Within
programme.desc: A two-time Olympic gold medallist and World Champion, lands the hardest tricks that changed the sport forever!

programme.title: SKI: Anywhere from Here – Walker Woodring's Journey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SKI: Anywhere from Here – Walker Woodring's Journey
programme.desc: Explore skiing through 11 year old Walker Woodring's eyes as he focuses on fun, not 'real life' as a prodigy.

programme.title: SKI: She Who Flies – Mathilde Gremaud's Story
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SKI: She Who Flies – Mathilde Gremaud's Story
programme.desc: This cinematic journey charts the highs, lows and in-betweens of Freeski World Champion Mathilde Gremaud.

programme.title: SNOW: Legend Has It – Decades of Epic Moments
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SNOW: Legend Has It – Decades of Epic Moments
programme.desc: The mythology of extraordinary ski and snowboard events Teton Gravity Research captured over three decades.

programme.title: SKI: After the Snowfall – Chasing Powder, Embracing Joy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SKI: After the Snowfall – Chasing Powder, Embracing Joy

programme.title: SNOW: Pressure Drop – Cinematic Skiing and Snowboarding
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SNOW: Pressure Drop – Cinematic Skiing and Snowboarding
programme.desc: Follow elite skiers and snowboarders in a cinematic ride through risk, beauty and the pursuit of perfection.

programme.title: SNOWBOARDING: Layers – Personal Stories Carved in Snow
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SNOWBOARDING: Layers – Personal Stories Carved in Snow
programme.desc: See what makes snowboarding more than a sport as you meet local heroes, their communities and favourite spots.

programme.title: SNOWBOARDING: Milestone – BTS of Eero Ettala's Career
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SNOWBOARDING: Milestone – BTS of Eero Ettala's Career
programme.desc: Pro snowboarder Eero Ettala works on a new video part while balancing family and reflecting on his career.

programme.title: SNOWBOARDING: Echoes of Impact – Marcus Kleveland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SNOWBOARDING: Echoes of Impact – Marcus Kleveland
programme.desc: See how Marcus Kleveland battles with injury, pressure and the passion that fuels his snowboarding journey.

programme.title: Ice Waterfalls

programme.title: WOF Evergreens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E48 Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: WOF Evergreens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 World Air Games 2015 - Part 2
programme.desc: The FAI World Air Games are the most important international multi-discipline air sports event in which the best athletes in the world take part. There will be 11 sports and 24 disciplines. More than 1000 athletes, crews and officials will take part.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is looking forward to returning to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to open the 2024 season with the discipline of kite surfing. In February, the best kite-surfing athletes will compete against each other at the Kite-Surf World Cup

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kite Park League World Championships – Hood River (USA) – Best Of
programme.desc: The moment many people have been waiting for is finally here - one of the biggest kiteboarding events. While there are many great kiteboarding locations around the globe, perhaps one of the most historic is Hood River, Oregon, the birthplace of parkriding.

programme.title: Defender GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sylt (GER) – Overall Highlights
